arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers sleeps well as Celtic boss has no headaches for Rangers clash and he makes one thing crystal clear
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers has won two of the club's eight domestic clean sweeps - and he is on course for his own treble Treble

arts.ttl: Pat Bonner and John Collins in agreement about Daizen Maeda as Celtic beat Hibernian
arts.sum: The man from Japan can’t be stopped as he netted goal number 27 for the season when Celtic beat Hibernian in the Scottish Cup on Sunday. What was said about ‘electric’ Daizen Maeda as Celtic beat Hibernian in the Scottish Cup

arts.ttl: 'Rangers stole our game' Brendan Rodgers declares Celtic derby ready as key strength of rivals named
arts.sum: The runaway league leaders welcome Barry Ferguson's men to Parkhead next Sunday for a blockbuster derby

arts.ttl: Maeda strikes again as Celtic sink Hibernian in Scottish Cup quarter-final
arts.sum: Daizen Maeda continued his fine goalscoring form to send Celtic on their way to Hampden Park as they beat Hibernian 2-0 in their Scottish Cup quarter-final. The Japan attacker pounced on a rebound to net from close range in the 39th minute for his 14th goal in 13 matches, and 28th for the season. The substitute Adam Idah sealed the victory in stoppage time as Celtic remained on course for a domestic treble. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Watch holders Celtic beat Hibs in Scottish Cup quarters
arts.sum: Daizen Maeda and Adam Idah score as holders Celtic beat Hibernian to move into the semi-finals of the Scottish Cup.

arts.ttl: The REAL Celtic make VIP pundit dumbstruck as Neil Lennon corrects himself over 'ridiculous' Rodgers record
arts.sum: The Hoops are off to Hampden once again after downing Hibs 2-0 at Parkhead

arts.ttl: Celtic player ratings, three get 8/10 and one pleads his case for a summer deal in Scottish Cup win vs Hibs
arts.sum: The Celtic manager would have liked to have settled the result earlier in the game, but a first-half goal from Daizen Maeda and a late strike from Adam Idah were enough to get Celtic into another major domestic cup final. Celtic player ratings as Brendan Rodgers books another Hampden Scottish Cup date

arts.ttl: Celtic Player Ratings: The standout stars as Bhoys end Hibs streak
arts.sum: Celtic have ended Hibs' unbeaten streak to make it into the Scottish Cup semi-finals. Here's how every player performed on the day.

arts.ttl: Celtic's 'physical beast' Maeda makes mark yet again
arts.sum: Celtic forward Daizen Maeda has been described as a "machine" and a "physical beast" and is having the season of his career.

arts.ttl: Four big talking points after Celtic power past Hibs to stay on treble course
arts.sum: Tony Haggerty's instant analysis as goals from Daizen Maeda and Adam Idah see off Hibs to book a Scottish Cup semi-final berth.
